aka: Domovye Ili Son v Zimnyuyu Noch
this_title: Домовые, или Сон в зимнюю ночь
trans_title: 宅在家中，或者睡在冬夜中
Domovye Ili Son v Zimnyuyu Noch
introduction: Brownies, or sleep in the winter night - a Soviet cartoon called for popularizing energy-saving, heat and water. Vladimir Samsonov shot in 1987 in the studio "Ekran", as voiced by the ensemble of "Good lads." In general this is a cheerful cartoon in the style of Soviet perestroika breakdancing!
chinese_title: 宅在家中，或者睡在冬夜中
foreign_title: Домовые, или Сон в зимнюю ночь
